Text: Hyah!
Too slow!

When wielding a sword, your response appears visibly
slower compared to using a spear.

You've made remarkable progress, transitioning from
struggling with the slime suit to effectively wielding
slime-based weaponry.

All while effortlessly enduring both Lambda's hellish
mental and physical training.

Guess that proves your titles, "Velgata's Seven
Blades" and "First Named Child," were more
than mere decorations.

Still, you're too slow. Lady Alpha has high hopes for
your combat potential, but...

If things continue like this, those hopes might go
unrealized. You won't be ready to wield the slime
sword anytime soon.
But...!

Any objections? Or do you perhaps have a compelling
reason to participate in combat?
Yes...I do!

...Gamma mentioned it, but it seems you really don't
have a clear understanding of yourself.

You seem to lack the ability for introspection. Could
this be a consequence of your past affiliation with
the Cult?

Your assigned position and tasks as an aristocrat in
the Cult, playing a predefined role, and completing
designated missions...

Despite the control the Cult wields over their
forces, they seem quite vulnerable to unforeseen
situations. Is this the inherent cost of such an
organizational structure?

Why not show a hint of anger? It's evident that my
words have clearly wounded your dignity.
...I lack the authority to express such emotions.
I see...

Well then, what if I...as one of the Seven Shadows,
were to forbid you from seeking revenge and
reclaiming your lost honor?
*gasp*
But...!

"But..."? Is that all you can say? Very well, I grant
you temporary permission to speak your mind.

If I can't fight, then there's no point in living
with such shame!
Shame, huh? What is it you're ashamed of?

Don't tell me you feel ashamed about joining the
Shadow Garden.

...I...can't forgive Sergey...the man who took
everything away from me!

Whether I continue to live as a member of the Garden
or not, I cannot move forward, not even a single
step...unless I defeat Sergey!
Revenge, huh?

Your thirst for revenge ultimately boils down to your
selfish emotions, doesn't it?
Epsi...Lady Epsilon!
Struggling with the formalities, are we?
Never mind. Continue.
Lady Epsilon, were you also possessed?
Yes, that's right.

In that case, Lady Epsilon, don't you harbor any
resentment towards your fate and the various
individuals who led you to it?

In other words, you resent those individuals who made
you suffer as one of the possessed...

...and took everything from you when you were
Lady Karen.
...Yes.
Well...I'd be lying if I said I held no resentment.

But those feelings weren't all that significant for
my true self...
Your true self?!
"Do you want more power?"

When Master Shadow saved me, my first thoughts were
that if there exists a power to overcome possession,
I would seek revenge against all those responsible
for my suffering.
"Then I shall grant it to you..."

As if seeing through my desire for revenge, he...
Master Shadow said this to me.

"It is fine to fall into madness in a false world.
But if you want to know the true world...then
follow me."

"Know the true world"... I believe his words held two
meanings.

One was literal: to know the truth of this world
controlled by the Cult.

And the other meaning was to discover my true self
from within. To find what truly matters to me.
The truth from within!

If pursuing revenge leads you to discover your true
self.

If it's the only path for your spirit to step forward
into the future...then I believe fighting for revenge
is the right thing to do.

But...if you choose to pursue revenge without a clear
understanding of what you seek, it's no different
from being a puppet of fate in a false world.
Just like you were as Lady Karen von Herzog.
*gasp*

Well, no two people are the same, not when it comes
to such things. But there's one thing I can tell you
for certain...
To uncover any truth, you must hone your abilities!
Urgh!

Even if you're unsure of your path, struggle
desperately onward through life, No. 111.

Gain the ability to discover the truth within
yourself! There is always something waiting
beyond the grime of life!

When your weapon of defense effortlessly transforms
from a slime spear into a slime sword...

...that's when you'll undoubtedly grasp your own
truth.
Lady Epsilon...!

Alright, break time is over! Let's start from the top
again!
Understood!
